Alissa: A garden fills with life as Alissa hums her sweet tunes.#You gain +4 Farming with her by your side.
Corine: Corine's fiery ambition and energy inpsires and pumps you up!#You gain +1 Speed, +1 Defense, and +1 Attack with her by your side.
Daia: Everything, even lady-luck herself, seems to fall for Daia's seductive smile.#You gain +2 Luck and +32 Magnetism with her by your side.
Flor: With such watchful yet quiet eyes, Flor helps you spot dropped objects from a distance.#You gain +64 Magnetism with her by yor side.
Ian: Ian's perserverance and hardworking demeanor influences you to work harder.#You gain +80 MaxStamina with him by your side.
Jeric: Here goes Jeric being competitive all over again.#It's getting you pumped up!#You gain +2 Farming, +2 Fishing, and +1 Foraging with him by your side.
Jio: Jio makes sure you're always prepared for battle.#He teaches you proper stances, breathing, and effectively using your weapon.#You gain +3 Attack and +2 Speed with him by your side.
Kenneth: Give Kenneth a workbench and he won't stop talking about gadgets and gizmos!#You gain +5 Crafting with him by your side.
Maddie: Maddie's knowledge of minerals and local flora proves handy in your adventures.#You gain +3 Mining and +2 Foraging with her by your side.
Philip: Being really careful, Philip monitors your proper body mechanics as you do your daily activities.#You gain +4 Defense with him by your side.
Shiro: Shiro's company makes you feel at ease.#There's something about him that warms your heart.#You gain +3 Luck and +60 MaxStamina with him by your side.
Ysabelle: As Ysabelle moves with such grace, you can't help but to be in awe.#She becomes an inspiration!.#You gain +3 Speed and +20 MaxStamina with her by your side.
Kiwi: Kiwi is fast, and you're pressured to be as well.#You gain +5 Speed from all the pressure you're feeling
Keahi: Keahi radiates energy and shares his talents of craft.#You gain +2 Digging, Mining, and Crafting and +30 MaxStamina with him!
Trinnie: Trinnie radiates energy and shares her talents of farming.#You gain +3 Farming and Foraging and +30 MaxStamina with her!
